meanings.definition: The act of joining or attaching fabrics together using a needle and thread.
meanings.sent1: My grandma enjoys sewing quilts for the family.
meanings.sent2: I learned sewing from my mom who is a talented seamstress.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to help with the sewing by playing with the thread.
meanings.sent4: Her love for sewing was like a colorful tapestry weaving through her life.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the needle sewing through the fabric was soothing.

meanings.definition: The craft or skill of stitching fabrics together to create garments or other items.
meanings.sent1: Sewing requires patience and precision to make beautiful clothes.
meanings.sent2: She honed her sewing skills by practicing every day.
meanings.sent3: The robot attempted sewing, but its stitches were all crooked.
meanings.sent4: In her hands, sewing became a magical art form.
meanings.sent5: The sewing of the dress transformed the plain fabric into a stunning gown.
